readability_reflection: I found sting interpolation more readable. The strings are spaced out more and it uses less symbols.
comprehension_debugging: Yes, found that with concatenation I had to read longer to separate the string variables from the rest of the string.
preference_rationale: I would choose interrelation because I found it much easier to read
learning_curve: I may have found interpolation easier because I have more experiences using it. I believe it is the default way its taught in most schools and lessons.
suggestions_improvement: Spacing out the concatenated variables would help with readability.
